title: How NOT to Build a Gaming PC in 2018
tags: how not to build a gaming pc
description: YouTube has a lot of how to build a gaming PC tutorials but this definitely isn't one. How to ACTUALLY Build a Gaming PC:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
